game_description: Become the Hero of your dreams, as you combine multiple fantastic superpowers in unique ways and take on Ninjas, Robots, Agents, and more! Fight, fly, swing, shoot, and smash your way through physics-based ragdoll enemies! Physical weapons with full stabbing physics! Collect new abilities, weapons, and items to develop your own personal combat style! Switch power sets on the fly to create an infinite number of unique combos! Grab an enemy Robot, throw it into the air, jet boost after him, and then punch him through a wall, before grappling him back to you for another round! Destructible Objects! Use the environment to smash your enemies through walls, floors, and a ton of breakable items. Future updates will include additional powers, enemies, levels, challenges, storylines, events, and more! Project Demigod is currently in Early Access, and will continue to receive constant updates.
review_1: Hey guys got some bad news the creator as fallen sick with auto-immune disorder so he cant work on the game so there wont be any updates for a few weeks.but there is a way we all could help we can put reviews wishing him a speedy recovery plz do this it will make his day a bunch

And whenever you feel you‚Äôre ready to come back to developing this game please try and make a Miles Morales power-set with Invisibility and Venom powers To all the people who read this, Please like this post so he will get better and try to make a Miles Morales power-set

review_5: So the game is good itself don‚Äôt get me wrong, but after a while it just gets a little boring especially when it comes to the NPCs, like if it would be possible, there should be mods either in game where it‚Äôs automatic or just people making mods for the game and we have to install them manually, and also for the human regular NPCs, instead of just standing there, they should walk around and if we attack them, then they should try to fight back (even though it would be pointless) but I feel like that would give the game the spark that it craves, because like I said yes, the game is really good, but after a while it gets a little boring.. so I don‚Äôt know if everything that I suggested would be possible to do especially since the Oculus Headset doesn‚Äôt have that much capabilities unless you use a computer..
